page.title: 04Our School
page.content: Our school gives education for five to twelve-year olds.It is 14 years old and it has got 34 rooms.It has got 6 full time teachers.When the school opened it had 128 pupils but now it has 158.It has a large playing field for the juniors and a smaller one for the infants.We have got several governors including Mr.Herbert and Mr.Story. The teachers are Mrs.Digby,Mrs. Edwards,Mrs.Edney,Mr.Lynn and Mrs. Hadley.Mr.Halliday is the headmaster. The classes are 5H - 33 children,4L - 36 children,3L - 33 children,2E - 31 children and 1D - 25 children,so the average number of children per class in our school is 31.6. We come to school at 9 oclock in the morning.Dinner is from 12 to 1 and we go home at three oclock.
